original_title: The Police: Ghost In The Machine Tour - Live At Gateshead 1982
overview: This video captures The Police during one of their best performances. At the time (1982) The Police were on a high with many fans across the world, but they hadn't quite hit the peak of their superstardom - that was at least another album away.
title: The Police: Ghost In The Machine Tour - Live At Gateshead 1982
